#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){

    string a;
    vector<string>v;
    int i,start=0;
    getline(cin,a);

    for(i=0;i<a.length();i++){
        if(a[i]==' '){
            //cout<<"init start "<<start<<' '<<i<<endl;
            string temp=a.substr(start,i-start);
            reverse(temp.begin(),temp.end());
            //cout<<temp<<endl;
            v.push_back(temp);
            start=i+1;
        //cout<<"final start "<<start<<' '<<i<<endl;
        }
    }
    string temp=a.substr(start,a.length()-start-1);
    reverse(temp.begin(),temp.end());
    v.push_back(temp);

    for(i=0;i<v.size()-1;i++){
        cout<<v[i]<<' ';
    }
    cout<<v[v.size()-1]<<a[a.length()-1]<<endl;



}
